stereo.plots.plot_heatmap_marker_genes¶

stereo.plots.plot_heatmap_marker_genes(adata=None, cluster_name='clustering', fine_maker_name=None, num_show_gene=8, show_labels=True, order_cluster=True, marker_clusters=None, cluster_colors_array=None, **kwargs)¶

marker gene heatmap.

Parameters

  • adata (Optional[AnnData]) – AnnData object.

  • cluster_name – the task’s name, defined when running ‘Clustering’ tool by setting ‘name’ property.

  • fine_maker_name – the task’s name, defined when running ‘FindMaker’ tool by setting ‘name’ property.

  • num_show_gene – number of genes to show in each cluster.

  • show_labels – show gene name on axis.

  • order_cluster – reorder the cluster list in plot (y axis).

  • marker_clusters – the list of clusters to show on the heatmap.

  • cluster_colors_array – the list of colors in the color block on the left of heatmap.

Returns

None

Example:

plot_heatmap_maker_genes(adata=adata, marker_uns_key = "rank_genes_groups", figsize = (20, 10))
